bug.title: mod_disk_cache: caching responses to no-store requests
bug.description:
Looks like a possible RFC 2616 MUST violation. Apache caches response to a request with no-store cache-control directive. The bug is submitted with elevated severity level because the violation might affect end-user privacy.
See attached trace for details and ways to reproduce the violation.
Test case IDs in the trace link to human-oriented test case description and RFC quotes, if available.
